ygData.msgSnippet: Hmm.. Speaking of damage, I d like to mention missiles, charges, and grenades. On the show, some of those weapons didn t do too much damage, but some did do

Hmm.. Speaking of damage, I'd like to mention missiles, charges, and 
grenades. On the show, some of those weapons didn't do too much 
damage, but some did do alot. A missile launcher mounted on a jet 
fighter is most likely designed to do alot of damage (thet's why its 
limited to 2 missile shots per char per post), and some people have 
been taking them like optic shots.

Remember, the things are powerful, but akwuard. But if your char 
happens to get a direct hit, please post accordingly.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> OOC: Most people dont take much damage when I shoot the the 50cal.
> gattaling gun, so I'll explain about it. A 50cal. would be the kind 
of
> thing mounted on a helicopter or a jet fighter. It's big and 
powerful. A
> 50cal. can blow a 1 foot hole in a 6 inch thick stone wall. So will
> people please get hurt once in a wile. You dont have to do this when
> hit, but for the record, you would br loseing limbs if hit by this.
